name: ball-e
description:
Become the legendary Ninja Ball Warrior in ball-e!

Master the art of parkour as you navigate through procedurally generated traps and obstacles. Upgrade your abilities to avoid falling and getting caught, or face restarting from the beginning.

Unique Boss Battles!

Defeat a variety of themed bosses to progress through the different stages.

Abilities, Upgrades, and Characters

Discover and improve different abilities, upgrades, and characters with unique stats and starting abilities.
Unlock them by beating the different stages.

Endless Levels

Enjoy endless challenges with procedurally generated levels that offer new obstacles every time.

Fluid Physics-Based Movement

Experience fluid and dynamic movement, allowing for various combinations of abilities.
Discover hidden tricks to become faster and more agile.

Challenges and Training Mode

Beat small challenges in the stadium and compete with friends on the leaderboard.
Hone your skills in training mode to become the Ultimate Ninja Ball Warrior.

ball-e is designed to be challenging. Check if this game is for you:

  • Love overcoming challenges
  • Enjoy improving skills and techniques
  • Learn from mistakes and do not give up easily
  • Enjoy challenging games like Getting Over It or Elden Ring
  • Like to show off beating difficult games
  • Love balls
